title: parihAsam pOdAdO
sahitya:
parihAsam pOdAdO enran pAl paritApam vArAdO paramanun


anupallavi

  aridAna mAniDa janmam eDuttu shrI hari unran tiruvaDi aham koNDa enpAl


caraNam    piravip-perum kaDal karai shErndiDavE tirumantra upadEsham peranADi nALum sad-
guru tEDi uLLam vADi kuvalayam vAzh enakku aruL tandu manattuyar aghaTrAmalnI sheyyum
